item.title: Becoming Greener 1/X
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Recently I've taken steps to become greener / less eco-damaging. My awareness has changed about the environment which now translates to a different selection of goods in the supermarket. I'm sharing this part of my journey to maybe eventually become completely green while consuming more consciously.
